Next Right 
  
  const slider1 = new SlideMotion('[data-container=slider1]', {
    initialDisplayCount: 1,
    viewCount: 1,
    effectType: 'SLIDE',
    pagination: true,
    playofout: true,
    autoPlay: true,
  });
